Special Bead Ability: Wearer can cast his choice of cure serious wounds, remove blindness/deafness, or remove disease.
Wearer casts his spells at +4 caster level. Effect lasts 10 minutes.

Wearer can cast chaos hammer, holy smite, order’s wrath, or unholy blight (Will DC 17
            partial).

Summons a powerful creature of appropriate alignment from the Outer Planes (an angel, devil, etc.) to aid
            the wearer for one day. (If the wearer uses the bead of summons to summon a deity’s emissary
            frivolously, the deity takes that character’s items and places a geas upon him as punishment in the
            very least.)
